product.name: Almay Smart Shade Anti-Aging Skintone Matching Makeup
product.description: Almay Smart Shade™ anti-aging makeup makes it easy to find “the one” with just three skintone-adjusting shades to choose from, not hundreds! It adjusts to the natural tones and nuances of your skin with breakthrough new Almay ToneMimic™ shade-sensing bead technology which intuitively transforms to your skintone for your perfect shade while helping to erase flaws and imperfections. 4 out of 5 women saw an instant reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Helps protect against sun damage with broad spectrum SPF 20. HYPOALLERGENIC. DERMATOLOGIST TESTED. MADE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN. Shade Range:
